title: ‘Web3 Gaming Sucks’, Says Avalanche, Daring Gamers to Look
description: Avalanche turned heads at the Game Developers Conference with provocative branding—and flashy games that clashed with it in the best way possible.

title: Ripple execs reveal SEC seeking $2 billion in fines, say regulator has ‘become unhinged’
description:
Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse and CLO Stuart Alderoty have revealed that the SEC is seeking a staggering $2 billion in fines and penalties. According to the company’s executives, the fines have been proposed in a court filing that will be unsealed on March 26. ‘Unhinged’ SEC Garlinghouse said the SEC is seeking heavy penalties despite […]

The post Ripple execs reveal SEC seeking $2 billion in fines, say regulator has ‘become unhinged’ appeared first on CryptoSlate.
